meanings.definition: A person who creates or performs serial music.
meanings.sent1: The talented serialists played their music at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Many serialists gather to share their compositions and ideas.
meanings.sent3: The serialists decided to have a music battle to see who could create the best melody.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the harmonious sounds of the serialists' creations.
meanings.sent5: The young musician aspired to become a renowned serialist in the future.

meanings.definition: A group of composers who use serialism in their compositions.
meanings.sent1: The famous serialists collaborated on a new piece for the orchestra.
meanings.sent2: The audience was captivated by the unique style of the serialists' music.
meanings.sent3: During the music festival, the serialists surprised everyone with a spontaneous performance.
meanings.sent4: The city echoed with the innovative tunes of the serialists' latest work.
meanings.sent5: The studio was filled with the creative energy of the talented serialists.
